name: Shade Game
tagline: A Shady puzzle game for iPhones
body: ![Shade Game App Icon](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jrheaw/ShadeGame/master/ShadeButtonGame/Assets.xcassets/AppIcon.appiconset/12910322_10101292960638463_1851938825_n-60%403x.png) Shade Game is a puzzle game in which you try to shade all of the lights in just the right places, but when you throw shade on one square, the surrounding squares switch! Included as a bonus: a button based on the popular and awesome [shade button web app](http://shadebutton.com). This button plays just the right sound when you say those perfectly insulting words you spent all week thinking of. ### Authors and Contributors [Jacob Wittenauer](https://github.com/jrheaw) Logo and app design - [David Chao](https://www.behance.net/dchao) Sound effects and buttons - http://kenney.nl/ ### Support or Contact Tweet to @jrheaw
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
